duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct and basic patient care activities under the guidance and direction of a Registered Nurse.
Maintain and stock supplies and equipment, including the transportation of patients, supplies, and equipment.
Perform direct and indirect patient care activities following RN instructions, physician orders, policies, procedures, and regulations.
Demonstrate competence in feeding patients, knowledge of dysphagia precautions, and calculating and recording intake and output.
Collect specimens and apply heat and cold packs, ace wraps, slings, binders, protective devices, and orthopedic devices.
Participate in hourly rounding programs and schedules to ensure patient safety and reduce patient harm.
Seek assistance of the Nurse Manager or designee for conflict resolution.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate/Equivalent required. PA Nurse Aide Registry (CNA) OR completed a minimum of one semester of clinical rotations in an accredited nursing program.
